Welcome

I am a full-stack web and mobile application developer.

I have enjoyed coding professionally for over 15-years. Primarily in the JVM (Java Platform) space. I have a deep level of experience in many technologies.

Languages & Frameworks

These are the languages and frameworks I use often. I have experience with many others.

  • iOS / Objective-C
  • Groovy / Java
  • Angular.js, jQuery, JavaScript, REST
  • Android
  • HTML5, CSS, Responsive Web Design
  • Grails, Spring MVC, Hibernate
  • Wordpress, PHP

Tools

  • Git
  • Gradle
  • IntelliJ
  • TextMate & vim
  • Linux, Apache, Tomcat, MySQL, Oracle

I also dabble in design and have decent photoshop chops.
